channel.title: Aetheric Press RSS
channel.description: 22-Minutes-style satire on current headlines, with Baatorian spice.

item.title: Budget Bedlam as Bets Abound
item.description: Canadian political theatre heating up as blue and red make big bets, with parliamentary majority at stake.

item.title: Virtuous Teenager Saves Grandma from Flu Symptoms
item.description: When her grandma started exhibiting moderate flu symptoms, her recall of advertising culture allowed her to make a passionate plea that she buy drugs from her doctor. A few months later, there was no sign of the flu.

item.title: Massive Push to Jamaican Reconstruction Efforts as American Celebrities Come Together
item.description: A stream of donations and gifts from American celebrities bring hope to the devastion brought by Hurricane Melissa to Jamaica

item.title: LA's Divine Narrative Collapses into Divine Comedy
item.description: LA's growing narrative adds star power to Ohtani's greatness, but it hasn't been working out

item.title: Breaking: Mariner's Sweep Averted by Blue Jays
item.description: Mariners drop game 4 to Blue Jays in wild game
